item.title: How to install truffle, compile and run our first smart contract with Solidity
item.description: In this article I will guide you through a complete step by step guide about how to configure your machine and setup to have your first smart contract running and installed on a Blockchain. Warning This article was developed using Truffle v5.5.3 (core: 5.5.3), Ganache v7.0.1, Solidity - 0.8.12 (solc-js), Node v17.7.0 and Web3.js v1.5.3 Steps The steps we are going to make are listed below Configure our environment and install required tools: truffle, ganache.
